translations: n.贵妇；继承亡夫爵位的遗孀；老年贵妇人

sentences.sentence: Mesdames (to the dowagers), you will take cold to a dead certainty, if you stay in this chill gallery any longer.
sentences.translation: 夫人们(向着两位遗孀)，要是你们在冷嗖嗖的走廊上再呆下去，那肯定要得感冒。

sentences.sentence: EvidentLy, the soul-stealing activities of the fox demon were associated with the impropriety of rule by empress dowagers.
sentences.translation: 显然，狐妖的魂魄窃取活动被同皇太后的不当统治联系在一起。
